name: Ritual
description:
Phantom No.4:

A ritualistic dance slowly begins the construction of a human-like entity.

The Phantom series is a collection of pieces that are leading up to a real-time animated short film I'm making, working title "Phantom", that tells the story of the creation of an A.I. through dance, music and procedural animation.

video | 1080 x 1080 | 30fps

Art and music: Daniel Sierra | @dbsierra4444
